He is once again requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and to pay for the labor to engage in the seasonal agricultural activities.  This way he will plant basic grains right away.  He hopes that the harvests will be abundant and healthy.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to pay for the labor to engage in the seasonal agricultural activities.

loans.name: Geovanni

texts.es:
Estudiar y trabajar a la vez, no es fácil. Se requiere de mucha disciplina y dedicación para rendir eficientemente en ambas áreas. Geovanni es testigo de esto porque actualmente estudia Ingeniería Industrial por la noche y trabaja en como agente de tránsito por el día. 

Sin embargo, solicita un crédito para pagar los aranceles de un cuatrimestre de su último año universitario. Esto le será de ayuda porque podrá graduarse en tiempo y forma. Asimismo, podrá optar por empleos de su área. El sueño de Geovanni emprender una empresa.
texts.en:
Studying and working at the same time isn't easy. It requires a lot of discipline and dedication to do well in both areas. Geovanni can testify for this because he is currently studying Industrial Engineering at night, while working as a traffic agent during the day.

However, he is requesting a loan to pay for enrollment fees for four months in his last year at school. This will help him because he will be able to graduate on time. Also, he will be able to choose from jobs in his area. Geovanni's dream is to launch a business.

loans.use: to pay for enrollment at school.

loans.name: Jai Laxmi Group

texts.en:
Jai Laxmi Group was formed in the year 2015 at Sagarapalli village, of Kalahandi district, Odisha, India. There are 10 active, self-dependent women, with an objective for developing their existing businesses as well as their livelihood. 

All the members of the concerned group have their own profession and business. Janhabi is one of them who has taken a great role for her development and for the group members to have a source of revenue improvement. She is standing in front of all group members with her hand raised in the photo. She is about 38 years old and living with her small family consisting of her husband and three children.

Her family has been engaged with vegetable cultivation at Sagarapalli, dist Kalahandi, Odisha, India, for the last five years. The complete family is promoting vegetable cultivation. But through the concerned business, Janhabi earns a monthly income of 7,000 INR. Her opinion is that their income is not sufficient to maintain her family. There are almost zero surpluses at the end of the month. 

She planned to improve her business over the course of the loan. From the loan Janhabi will purchase modern cultivation equipment and items. She hopes to get more and more profit from this investment and save money to provide a high-class education to her children. 

The other nine members of her group are also smart at their professions and are also actively engaged with different business like vegetable vending, a milk business, a salon, tailoring, a popped rice business, paddy (rice), a general store and a transport business. With this loan, they hope to heighten their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase modern cultivation equipment and items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock of timber and furniture making tools such as drills and nails for making more furniture for sale.

loans.name: Jaqueline María

texts.es:
Jaqueline es una joven comprometida con sus ideales y sueños, desde adolescente sabía que quería ser odontóloga, porque es una profesión que va ganando demanda por parte de la población. Actualmente, está en cuarto año de su carrera y cuenta con el apoyo de su papá  y su esposo.

Sin embargo, solicita un crédito para pagar un curso clínico que es requisito para iniciar su culminación de estudios. Entre los planes de Jaqueline está ahorrar para poner una clínica dental.
texts.en:
Jaqueline is a young woman who is committed to her ideals and dreams. Since she was an adolescent, she knew that she wanted to be an odontologist because it is a profession which is becoming higher in demand. Currently, she is in her fourth year at school, and she has the support of her father and her husband.

However, she is requesting a loan to pay for a clinical course which is a requirement to begin the completion of her studies. One of Jaqueline's plans is to save money in order to open a dental clinic.

loans.use: to pay for a course at school.

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en:
Wilfred is aged 44 years, married to Jackline, and supports seven children. He has been a farmer for the last 15 years and the business earns him KES 12,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and sell the surplus in the market. He plans to use the profits gained to purchase a dairy cow for milk production for sale to clients, and also to educate his child. 

Wilfred's hope is to expand his business and be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Santos Cristóbal

texts.es:
Santos de 46 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y humilde que a pesar de las circunstancias de la vida se ha podido superar día a día a con su trabajo, está casado y solo tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran estudiando.

Actualmente se dedica a la labor de estructuras metálicas, además es albañil y agricultor, ya tiene más de 20 años realizando estas actividades y su esposa e hijos son quienes se involucran en el trabajo.


Él necesita este crédito para reparar un molino de motor y para comprar insumos agrícolas para los cultivos de maíz.

Él sueña con ayudar a sus hijos hasta terminar sus estudios y que sean profesionales, además quiere reforzar su equipo de trabajo de estructuras metálicas.
texts.en:
Santos, age 46, is a very hard-working and humble person.  In spite of his life circumstances, he has been able to improve, day to day, with his work.  He is married, and he only has three children who go to school.

He currently works with metal structures.  He is also a bricklayer and a farmer.  He has been engaged in these business activities for over 20 years.  His wife and children are involved in the work.

He needs this loan to repair a motorized mill and to buy agricultural supplies for his corn crops.

He dreams of helping his children complete their education and of them becoming professionals.  He also wants to bolster his metallic structure work equipment.

loans.use: to repair a motorized mill and to buy agricultural supplies for his corn crops.

loans.name: Nawunchalikazee, Shirikpamo/bimbilla Group

texts.en:
Ayishetu is a 45-year-old married woman with four children living in Shirikpamo, Bimbilla, in the northern region of Ghana. Ayishetu is a member of a rice processing group called "Nawunchalikazee, Shirikpamo / Bimbilla." 

Ayishetu is the woman squatting in front with both hands on a basin of paddy rice in the group picture. She has been in the business for the past eight years and is now working with four employees. 

Ayishetu intends to grow her business more by diversifying in cereal (grain) banking. She and her group have therefore requested a loan of GHS 13,800. Ayishetu’s share of the loan is GHS 500, which would be used to buy more paddy rice from local rice farmers for processing.

Ayishetu expects to repay this loan and provide nutritious food for her children with profit she would make from her business. She is thankful to Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy more paddy rice from local rice farmers for processing.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: El Señor Victor tiene 56 años de edad y su esposa Eulogia tiene 53 años, tienen tres hijos y todos son independientes, ambos estudiaron hasta primaria por razones económicas no culminaron sus estudios dedicándose desde muy jóvenes  a la actividad de la agricultura, ya tienen 30 años trabajando en el rubro, actualmente viven solos y producen papa, ajo, durazno y otras verduras según las temporadas de siembra, siendo que la agricultura es una actividad muy sacrificada, ellos dan su mejor esfuerzo para lograr cosechar productos de buena calidad, el señor Victor solicita un crédito para comprar semilla de papa, ajo y para abonar sus tierras, de esta manera ellos podrán tener más ingresos para mejorar su producción y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señor Victor is 56 years old, and his wife Eulogia is 53 years old. They have three children, and they take care of all of them currently. Both Victor and his wife studied until elementary school. For financial reasons, neither finished school since they began working in agriculture when they were very young. They have been working in agriculture for 30 years.

Currently, they live alone and grow potatoes, garlic, peaches and seasonal vegetables. Since agriculture is an occupation that requires much sacrifice, they make their best effort to grow high-quality crops. Señor Victor is requesting a loan to buy potato and garlic seeds, and to fertilize his land. Through this, Victor and his wife will be able to increase production, earn more income, and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy potato and garlic seeds, and fertilize his land in order to increase production, earn more income and improve his quality of life.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
Marcelino tien 54 años de edad, conviviente , con un hijo a su cargo , vive en casa propia; en el sector nueva Arica, que pertenece al distrito de Cayalti, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque; costa norte de Perú, la cual es una zona rural, que se dedica mayormente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio mayormente.

Marcelino se dedica a brindar servicio de jornaleria; hace 20 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; mantenimiento y compra de nuevas herramientas de trabajo que le permitirán dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 54 years old, and he has a partner and one son that he takes care of. He lives in his own home, in the Nueva Arica area. This area is part of the district of Cayalti in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayque region on the northern coast of Perú. This is a rural area, and the residents primarily make a living in agriculture, ranching and commerce.

Marcelino has made a living as a day laborer for 20 years. His business is located in his home. He is requesting a loan to invest in fixed assets: to do maintenance and buy new work tools. This will enable him to offer better service to his customers, and as a result earn more income and improve the quality of his life.

loans.use: to do maintenance and buy new work tools.

loans.name: Ma. Marietes

texts.en: Ma. Marietes is into farming to support her family. She and her family live in Trinidad, a town in Bohol, Philippines. She is engaged in farming rice while her husband works as a carpenter. She works hard tilling the land, hoping for a good harvest. She has applied for a loan knowing that this could help them. The money that they will get will be used to acquire fertilizers and pesticides. With this, she can expect a better yield on her crops. Any income derived from this business will be spent on her family’s daily consumption and on school fees for her four children, ages three to sixteen.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: José Noé

texts.es:
José de 41 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado ya que mejor decidió trabajar para poder apoyar a su familia, está acompañado y su esposa solo se dedica a cuidar sus hijos ya que tiene tres que son menores de edad.

José trabaja en una ferretería como cargador, además de eso en sus ratos libres se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz, trabaja todos los días pues así es como obtiene ingresos para mantener a su familia.


Él solicita este crédito para instalar servicio de agua potable en su casa, ya que en su comunidad no cuentan con este vital líquido.


Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos estudien ya que él no tuvo demasiada oportunidad para poder hacerlo.
texts.en:
José is 41 years old, and he studied through the second grade. At that time, he decided to begin working to support his family. He is married, and his wife takes care of their children since he has three young children.

José works at hardware store as a loader. In addition to this, in his free time he makes a living growing corn. He works everyday since this is the way he earns income to take care of his family. 

He is requesting a loan to install potable water at his home, since this service isn't offered in his community. 

His greatest dream is that his children study since he didn't have much opportunity to be able to do this himself.

loans.use: to install potable water at his home, since they don't currently have this in his community.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.pt:
A senhora Angelina de 35 anos de idade, é casada, trabalhadora, mãe de 1 filha sem idade escolar , tem também 1 sobrinha na sua responsabilidade, vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, pregos, blocos, chapas de zinco  para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
O cliente tem como sonho,  ampliar e concluir sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Angelina is 35 years old and married. She's in the workforce and has a daughter who's below school age. She also has a niece under her care. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she intends to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, nails, bricks, and zinc plates so that she can continue building her house.
Angelina's dream is to enlarge and finish her house in order to provide a better home for her family.
Her main challenges are financial. She has been working hard and she intends to get other loans so that she can overcome her struggles and accomplish her goals.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, nails, bricks, and zinc plates.

loans.name: Magnolia

texts.en:
Magnolia is a woman capable of handling multiple businesses. She is 47 years old from Trinidad, Bohol, Philippines. She has three dependents ages 3, 15 and 18. She owns a Sari-sari store, cooks, and sell dishes, coconut wine, lotion, clothes, cologne and perfume. The business is the source of her daily income. 

Magnolia needs to make further investments in her store, however she lacks the funds to do so. As of this time, she is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy additional items or merchandise to sell like cooking oil, sugar, meat and coconut wine. With the loan, she will be able to augment her stock to attract more customers, thus giving her the chance of increasing her sales.

Magnolia hopes to make her business grow and become more sustainable in the future.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, sugar, meat and coconut wine

loans.name: Gloria

texts.pt:
A senhora Gloria de 49 anos de idade é casada, comerciante vende diversos produtos em sua casa, mãe de 1 filho este a frequentar o ensino secundário, tem também 1 neta na sua responsabilidade e vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar diversos tipo de cervejas, refrescos, tomate, cebola, bolos de coco, farelo para o fabrico de bebida caseira para ampliar o seu negocio.
O cliente tem como sonho, ampliar o seu negocio para responder as necessidades dos seus clientes concluir e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o crédito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 49 years old and married. She's a vendor who sells various merchandise from home. She has a son who's in secondary school and also a granddaughter who's under her care. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she intends to purchase various types of beer, refreshments, tomatoes, onions, coconut cakes and bran for making homemade beverages. That way she'll expand her business.
Gloria's dream is to expand her business so that she can meet her customers' needs. She also dreams of finishing and enlarging her house in order to provide a better home for her family.
Her main challenges are financial. She has been working hard and plans on getting more loans so that she can overcome her struggles and accomplish her goals.

loans.use: to purchase various types of beer, refreshments, tomatoes, onions, coconut cakes, and bran for making beverages.

loans.name: Rita

texts.pt:
A senhora Rita de 48 anos de idade é solteira, comerciante de roupa usada, mãe de 1 filha que está a frequentar o ensino técnico, tem também 2 sobrinhos na sua responsabilidade, vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, pregos, blocos  para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, pretende também ampliar o seu negocio e abrir uma grande empresa de reparação de electrodomésticos.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o crédito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Rita is 48 years old and single. She sells used clothing and has a daughter who attends vocational school. She also has two nephews under her responsibility. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she intends to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, nails and bricks so she can continue her construction work.
Rita's dream is to finish and enlarge her house in order to provide a better home for her family. She also intends to expand her business and start a big company that provides appliance repair services.
Her main challenges are financial. She has been working hard and plans on getting more loans so that she can overcome her struggles and accomplish her goals.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, nails and bricks so she can continue her construction work.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
O senhor Tomas de 34 anos de idade, casado, trabalhador, pai de 6 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino secundário e 5 frequentam o ensino primário,  é responsável também por um neto , vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, uma porta para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, pretende também mobilar a mesma.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Tomas is 34 years old and married. He's in the workforce and has six children, one of whom is in secondary school and five are in primary school. He's also responsible for a grandson. He lives in a house that he owns.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams and a door so that he can continue his construction work.
Tomas's dream is to finish and enlarge his house in order to provide a better home for his family. He also intends to furnish his home.
His main challenges are financial. He has been working hard and plans on getting more loans so that he can overcome his struggles and accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams and a door so that he can continue his construction work.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
O senhor Tomas é casado, presta serviços de reparação de telemóveis, pai de 5 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam o ensino secundário e 3 frequentam o ensino primário, vive em casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, 2 carradas de areia   para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família, pretende também ampliar o seu negocio e abrir uma grande empresa de reparação de electrodomésticos .
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para superar as suas dificuldades financeira e obter bons rendimentos.
texts.en:
Tomas provides cell phone repair services. He's married and has five children, two of whom are in secondary school and three are in primary school. He lives in a house that he owns.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, and two cartloads of sand so that he can continue his construction work.
Tomas's dream is to finish his house in order to provide a better home for his family. He also intends to expand his business and start a large company that provides appliance repair services.
His main challenges are financial. He has been working hard and plans on getting more loans so that he can overcome his financial struggles and earn good profits.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, wire, beams, and two cartloads of sand so that he can continue his construction work.

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es: El señor Álvaro actualmente vive en el Departamento de La Paz se dedica a la agricultura, heredo una parte de las tierras de su madre donde comenzó a trabajar desde hace un año, cuenta con la experiencia necesaria para administrar con solvencia  su negocio, el señor Alvaro solicita un crédito para la compra de una cabeza de ganado vacuno que lo utilizara para el traslado de sus productos como también para la compra de  semillas y  abono para el roturado  del terreno, el solo cuenta con el apoyo de su madre ya que su padre los abandono hace mucho tiempo a sus hermanos y a él. El señor Alvaro se sentirá feliz al tener esta oportunidad para incrementar sus ingresos por la venta de su producción.
texts.en:
Alvaro currently lives in the La Paz Department and works in agriculture. He started working a year ago on some land he inherited from this mother.and he has the experience necessary to manage his business with solvency.

Alvaro is requesting a loan to buy livestock, which he will use to move products, and to buy seeds and manure to till the land. He receives support from only his mother, since his father abandoned him and his siblings a long time ago. Alvaro is happy to have this opportunity to increase his income through his production and sales.

loans.use: to buy livestock, which he will use to move products, and to buy seeds and manure to till the land.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a single woman living with her dad at his house, which was built with fragile adobe material, but has water and light.  Lucy earns a living making cheese, a skill she learned from her father, who trained her when she was a child. 

Lucy needs a loan to buy a milking cow so that she will be able make and sell more cheese, and to produce more milk.  She would like to have her own house in the future, and hopes you can help her.  She is young, healthy, and has no debts.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.pt:
A senhora Isabel tem 34 anos de idade, viúva e mãe de 03 filhos que frequentam o ensino escolar.
Trabalha no Hotel, desempenhando a função de hospedeira.
Nos empréstimos anteriores, construiu a sua habitação e não concluiu, sendo assim, com este empréstimo de 30.000,00mts, vai comprar cimento, varrões, blocos estribos para dar continuidade na construção da sua casa.
Ela, sonha em concluir a sua casa para confortar os seus filhos e melhorar as condiçoes da dieta alimentar. Apesar de enfrentar dificuldades financeiras, tem o desafio de reembolsar o empréstimo
texts.en:
Isabel is 34 years old. She's a widow and has three children who attend school.
She works as a receptionist for a hotel.
With the previous loans she built her house, but didn't finish it. Therefore she'll use this loan for 30,000mts to purchase cement, rods, bricks, and stirrups so that she can continue building her house.
Isabel's dream is to finish her house in order to provide comfort for her children. She also hopes to improve her diet. Although she faces financial struggles, her challenge is repaying the loan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rods, bricks, and stirrups so that she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is 30 years old and he lives with his mother and sister in Tsovagyugh village of Gegharkunik region. Usually he does construction work to order about the region, but his main occupations are farming and agriculture. In his farm he has cows, a heifer, bulls, lambs, sheep, chickens and several bee families. 

So with his farm produce such as milk, meat, eggs and honey, Artur also sells agricultural goods: potatoes, tomatoes, greens, garlic, cucumbers and peppers.  Artur mentions that potato-selling is greatly profitable for his family. He is seriously engaged in it and he will surely develop it. With this loan amount he decided to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel, and also some fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel, and also some fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is from Alcantara, Cebu, Philippines.  She is married and has a 17-year-old daughter.  She has owned a sari-sari (general) store business for twelve years now.  She also sell clothes known as RTW, selling shorts, shirts, and pants.  

Jovita is requesting a loan to buy eggs, seasoning, shampoo, bath soap, canned sardines, biscuits, chips, and to pay for tuition fees.  She dreams of seeing her daughter become successful in her studies.

loans.use: to buy eggs, seasoning, shampoo, bath soap, canned sardines, biscuits, chips and pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Haydee Leticia

texts.es:
Haydee es una muchacha muy emprendedora de 26 años de edad que con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante con su abuela que la ha criado desde pequeña, ella siempre se ha dedicado a estudiar ya que considera que si logra tener un título de universidad tendrá mejores oportunidades de trabajo. 

Ella lleva dos años de estudio en la universidad, su abuela le ayuda con los gastos de comida y transporte, de modo que con esfuerzo ha logrado avanzar para cumplir sus metas y no quiere quedarse estancada.


Ella solicita este crédito para cubrir gastos de mensualidades de la universidad.


Su sueño es terminar sus carrera pues no planea detenerse a pesar de las dificultades.
texts.en:
Haydee is a very entrepreneurial 26-year-old woman, who with much effort has kept moving forward along with her grandmother, who raised her since she was young. Haydee always has dedicated herself to her studies, since she knows that acquiring a university degree will give her better job opportunities.

She has been studying in the university for two years. Her grandmother helps to pay for food and transportation, and so with effort she has progressed toward her goals. She does not want to be kept at a standstill.

She is requesting this loan to cover the monthly university expenses. Her dream is to complete her degree, and she does not plan to stop, even despite the difficulties.

loans.use: to cover monthly university expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, crackers, soft drinks and other household staples.

loans.name: Kasiimu

texts.en:
Kasimu is a 49-year-old married man who lives in a rural area with his wife and ten children (all attend school). 

He  grows coffee and bananas and  works six days a week, 10 hours each day.

He started his business in 1995 to earn money. He needs a loan to buy fertilizer for his banana plantation.  His clients are traders from surrounding towns and his dream is to be the area's leading producer of bananas but needs additional capital.

He describes himself as a hard working man.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is an artisan from Ghana who specializes in batik wall art.  He would like to purchase bulk raw materials, including dyes and mounting boards for his business.  He has been selling his wall art through NOVICA since 2003.  This is his story:

"I majored in the arts, specializing in textiles and sculpture.  I have developed my own techniques in batik production using reactive to achieve the same or better effects than would be derived in paintings.  The results have been marvelous!  My themes are mainly of women, beach scenes and landscapes.  I try to depict the daily activities of women in Africa to support the fight for equality for the African woman."

"I thank the contributors of my loan for sustaining me in business.  Without this help, I could not have seen the progress I have achieved so far.  God bless you all."

Use the link below to view Samuel's batik wall art on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/3551

loans.use: to purchase bulk raw materials, including dyes and mounting boards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is 44 years old and he lives in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. Armen is married and he has two sons; his elder son is doing his military service in the army and his younger son is school-aged. His wife is a pedagogue. 

Armen works as a driver and at the same time does farming. In his farm he takes care of a cow, calves, a heifer, bulls and chickens. With his wife he manages to sell his farm produce right from his house: milk, meat, cheese, and eggs. 

Armen would like to add to the number of his farm cattle and he decided to do that with the help of Kiva lenders; with his loan amount he wants to buy a cow and also fodder for his cattle in the farm.

loans.use: to buy a cow and also fodder for his cattle in the farm

loans.name: Antoinette

texts.en:
Antoinette is a 62 year-old Lebanese married woman with two children who lives with her husband. She states that living costs are becoming very expensive and she needs to borrow money from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, to cover her child's study fees. 

Her first goal is to insure a good education for her child.

loans.use: to cover her child's study fees.

loans.name: Ada Yamileth

texts.es:
Ada, administra una tienda de productos de la canasta básica y además elabora antojitos para tener mejores ingresos, su negocio lo tiene desde hace mucho tiempo y lo desarrolla a tiempo completo, nació por la responsabilidad de darle a su familia un estilo de vida con menos carencias; vive con sus hijos y una hermana, tiene una conducta intachable dentro de su comunidad.
Comprará aceite, arroz, bebidas, boquitas, papas, yuca, gas licuado, azúcar, etc., surtirá la tienda y tendrá materia prima para preparar la venta de antojitos como tostadas de plátano, yuca frita, etc., tiene pensado utilizar el crédito para fortalecer su negocio y atender mejor las demandas de sus clientes, espera que las ventas aumenten y que tenga mejor estabilidad económica.
Su visión es tener resultados positivos de la inversión y cambiar sus condiciones de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Ada earns a living selling basic food products, and additionally she prepares snacks for sale to get more income.

Her business, which she started long time ago and is full-time work for her, was born of the responsibility to provide for her family a life with less deprivation. She lives with her two children and a sister. She maintains an impeccable behavior in her community.

Ada will buy oil, rice, drinks, snacks, potatoes, yucca, liquid gas, sugar, and more. She will stock the store and get the supplies she needs to make the snacks that she sells, such as plantain toasts and fried yucca.

She plans to use the loan to strenghten her business and better meet her clients' demands, looking to increase sales and reach economic stability.

Ada's goal is to achieve good results from this investment and to change the present life conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy  oil, rice, drinks, snacks, potatoes, yucca, liquid gas, sugar, and more to stock her store and get supplies for the snacks that she prepares.

loans.name: Sabrina Beatriz

texts.es:
Sabrina, utilizo el crédito anterior para fortalecer la crianza de cerdos, ha tenido muy buenos resultados, ya que la rentabilidad de su negocio mejoro en su momento, actualmente ha dejado de practicar dicha actividad, con las ganancias obtenidas logro establecer una tienda de productos para el hogar, su familia vive en óptimas condiciones.
Necesita de un crédito nuevo que en esta oportunidad le servirá para comprar azúcar, sal, bebidas, pastas, productos enlatados, condimentos, etc., así atenderá mejora a sus clientes, con productos frescos y de mucha calidad, espera continuar superándose y  tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Sabrina used her previous loan to strengthen her business of raising pigs, and she has had very good results and increased profitability. Now her family lives in better conditions and she has left that job.  With her new earnings she has opened a general store.

She needs a new loan to buy sugar, salt, drinks, pastries, canned goods, condiments, etc., so she can provide a better service to her customers with fresh, high quality products. She hopes to keep surpassing her accomplishments and to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, drinks, pastries, canned goods, condiments, etc., so she can provide a better service to her customers with fresh, high quality products.

loans.name: Lluvias De Bendicion Group

texts.en:
The nine women of this group live in the small village of La Ladrillera, outside of the town of San Pablo Jocopilas, Suchitepéquez, Guatemala.  A ladrillera is a brick factory and many years ago there was a brick making business. 

The women range in age from 21 to 50 and most  are younger than 30. Two of the members are illiterate and the most education anyone in the group has is 6th grade. THe group consists of two women who sell traditional clothing, two who make and sell food, one who makes and sells tortillas and one who sells fruit. There is also a woman who sells pork products and another who sells bananas. These are hard-working women and they became interested in working with Namaste because they felt the need to know learn how to manage a business. 

Namaste will provide group members with basic financial training, a business advisor to help them develop and follow a business plan, and a small loan.  They are very hopeful that these tools will make a difference in their business and their profits.

Doña Norma is a 31-year-old married woman with 4 children who are 13, 10, 8 and 3 years old.  The three oldest attend school. She  has  a first grade education. Her husband is a laborer. She started her business to sell traditional clothing one year ago.  She has many clients now because she provides excellent service and her clients like working with her. 

Her goal is to improve the service, increase her profits, and better support her family.  She will use her loan to increase her stock and add T-shirts to her inventory.  Her monthly net profit is 5,367 GTQ and she hopes to increase this to 7,525 GTQ during the nine-month loan cycle with Namaste.

loans.use: to increase her stock and purchase  T-shirts.

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
A $800.00 loan is offered to Ester to improve her business. Ester is a business woman who lives in Oecusse.   She earns a daily income  operating a store and she is happy to do her business which she started in 2010 $ 100.00 of  her own  capital. She will use the loan to buy additional supplies such as slippers, aqua, biscuits, soap, insect repellent, noodles, soft drinks, and other tiems to sell. 

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin.

loans.use: to buy slippers, aqua, biscuits, soap, insect repellent, noodles, soft drinks, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonings, toiletries, canned food, biscuits, candies, and condiments.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children (both attend school). 

He is an experienced owner of a mini market and has built a good business reputation. 

He is applying for a loan from Kiva's  partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay his children’s educational fees. He states that this loan will help them to pursue a good educational.

loans.use: to pay his children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more certified seeds and fertilizers to improve his farming.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La señora Rosa tiene 57 años de edad de estado civil casada, sin ningún dependiente, la familia vive en una comunidad rural del departamento Cochabamba. La señora y su esposo son personas trabajadoras, humildes y responsables, cuentan con una actividad de producción agrícola, con ingresos económicos por la venta estacional de sus productos dentro del año, de esta forma ellos se mantienen económicamente, la señora Rosa solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas abono orgánico y semilla de papa para la siembra de esta campaña agrícola ya que quieren aprovechar el precio bajo según la época, con esto ellos piensan mejorar económicamente para así poder vivir más cómodos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 57 years, is married and has no dependents. The family lives in a rural community in the department of Cochabamba. This woman and her husband are simple, hard-working and responsible people who work in agriculture. Their economic income is from the seasonal sales of their product during the year and in this way they support themselves economically.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs like organic manure and potato seed to plant for this growing season as she wants to take advantage of the seasonal low prices. Doing this they hope to improve their economic situation so they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like organic manure and potato seed to plant for this growing season as she wants to take advantage of the seasonal low prices.

loans.name: Satik

texts.en:
Satik is 26 years old and she lives with her mother-in-law and son in Kapan city of Syunik region. Satik is a widow. She has vocational medical education and for several years she managed to work as a nurse. Now she works at a private workshop and at the same time she is engaged in agricultural activities. On her plot of land she cultivates beans, potatoes, and onions. 

Satik sells her produce with the help of her mother-in-law. From her beautiful farm she also sells hay to her neighbors as fodder for their cattle. Satik does her best to provide her son with best living conditions and with all the needed supplies since this year he is going to attend school. Satik will use this loan of 500,000 Armenian drams  for the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer, and diesel fuel for her agricultural activities.

loans.use: to purchase potato seedlings, fertilizer, and diesel fuel for her agricultural activities

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is 35 years old and is  applying for $ 800.00 USD to improve her business.  She opened her kiosk in 2000 with her own working capital of $ 70.00.  She earns a good income from her business.

 She will use her loan to buy some stocks to keep in her store such as  fanta, cocacola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, biscuits, candles, and eggs. 

She is a very hard working woman who has operated her business for15 years. She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fanta, cocacola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, biscuits, candles, and eggs.

loans.name: Mujeres Franciscanas Group

texts.en:
The four women of this group live in the town of San Francisco Zapotitlán, Suchitepéquez, Guatemala and have named their group after their town, of which they are very proud. San Francisco Zapotitlán is a picturesque old town where the people follow the old customs in behavior and dress.  The economy of the region is based mostly on the cultivation of coffee and bananas. 

One of the group members sells second-hand clothing. Another has a small beauty salon. A third has a catalog business selling cosmetics and novelties. The fourth makes and sells sausage. These hardworking, dedicated women are starting their second nine-month loan cycle with Namaste, having successfully learned a lot about managing and growing a business during the first cycle. 

Now they are eager to continue improving their businesses through the more advanced business training that Namaste will provide to them during this second cycle. They will receive more classes in financial literacy and each will continue to have a personal business advisor who will help her with growing her business and meeting her goals.

Doña Ana Ester is 51 years old and married with four children.  She has a sixth grade education.  Her husband is a day laborer in the agricultural fields. For eleven years she has had a business making and selling sausage. She makes the sausage in her home and then delivers it to clients and also sells it on the street. Her dream is to continue to support her son who is still in school.  Her goal is to maintain her business and sell her product in more locations. 

During this cycle she is going to emphasize maintaining her notebook of sales and expenses as an important aid to managing and growing her business. Her current net profit is 5250 Guatemalan Quetzales.  Her goal for this cycle is to raise that to 8394 Guatemalan Quetzales.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients for her sausage business

loans.name: Silverio Antonio

texts.es: SILVERIO ANTONIO: Es un señor luchador de 52 años de edad, originario de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas, está casado, tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad y tiene a su cargo una nieta de 11 años de edad que estudia su cuarto grado de primaria. Su esposa cuenta con una experiencia de más de 2 décadas de ser enfermera. Él trabaja como vigilante, con su salario no le ajusta para poder iniciar la construcción de su vivienda, por lo que solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar: Hierro, cemento, bloques, arena, piedrín, ya que actualmente habita en casa de una hija. El y su esposa sueñan con tener una vivienda digna y segura.
texts.en:
Silverio Antonio is a determined man. He is 52 and from Bilwi, a town in Puerto Cabezas. He is married and has 5 grown-up children, as well as an 11-year-old granddaughter in his care who is in the 4th grade. His wife has more than two decades of experience as a nurse. 

He works as a security guard, but his salary cannot accommodate the start of building his home. This is why he asks for his first loan to buy iron, cement, blocks, sand, and gravel. 

He is currently living in his daughter's house. He and his wife dream of having a home that is dignified and safe.

loans.use: to start construction on his home

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with three children whom all attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a poultry business for the past three years, selling at the market and to the neighbors. She mentioned diseases as a major challenge in her business.

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase chicken feed and chicks for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans and boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicken feed and chicks for resale

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a married woman with one child, and she is staying together with her husband. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, she has operated a charcoal selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation.

She decided to join to Yehu to access loans to boost her business. With this KES 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 30-year-old man with a wife and four children, all living with him. Joseph is basically a businessman and does trading of agricultural produce such as maize and coffee. According to him, he is a hard-working man who has been able to achieve a lot from the produce business.

Besides that, Joseph is involved in agriculture and through this he has been able to construct a permanent home and has educated his children. According to him, his main challenge is price fluctuations which have led to loss of capital.

Joseph appeals to UGAFODE management to continue supporting low interest rate loans.

loans.use: To boost his produce business by buying more maize to sell

loans.name: Flaminio

texts.es:
Flaminio de 62 años de edad, es un agricultor muy trabajador y a la vez emprendedor, está casado y tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo 3 están en casa y los mayores son independientes.

Además de la agricultura, Flaminio se dedica a la crianza de peces.

Él solicita este crédito para mejorar los estanques donde tiene a los peces y comprar alimentos para los mismos. 


Su mayor sueño es ampliar la producción de tilapia, comercializar en grande y dar estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Flaminio, 62 years old, is a very hard-working farmer and also an entrepreneur. He is married and has 5 children, of whom only 3 are in the home and the older ones are independent. 

In addition to farming, Flaminio works raising fish.

He asks for this loan to improve the ponds where he has the fish and to purchase feed for them.

His greatest dream is to expand the tilapia production, sell it in larger numbers, and provide an education for his children.

loans.use: to improve the ponds where he has fish and to purchase feed for them.

loans.name: Gladys Bexsabe

texts.es:
Gladys, de 31 años de edad, está casada, tiene un hijo de un año de nacido.

Gladys, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace los 13 años, fue su padre le enseño y con el tiempo ella aprendió, ahora trabaja con su esposo a la siembra de hortalizas como chile, tomate, pepino, entre otros.

Gladys, está solicitando el crédito para comprar dos silos para procesar y guardar los granos básicos.

El sueño de Gladys, es poder poner su propio negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys, 31 years old, is married and has a one-year-old child.

Gladys has worked in agriculture for the past 13 years. Her father taught it to her and, with time, she learned. Now, she works with her husband growing vegetables such as chilies, tomatoes, cucumber, and more.

Gladys is asking for the loan to purchase two silos to process and store basic grains.

Gladys's dream is to be able to establish her own business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase two silos to process and store basic grains.

loans.name: Wumpini – Nakpayili Group

texts.en:
Azara is a 51-year-old hard-working woman from Nakpayili in the Northern region of Ghana. She is married and has seven children. Azara is the individual sitting in the middle with her hand raised among her group mates in the picture.

Azara is a member of a parboiled rice processing group that has been in business for the past 14 years. The name of the group is ‘Wumpini - Nakpayili’. She earns a good profit from the business simply because she has long standing experience in processing high quality parboiled rice for the Ghanaian local markets. 

Azara and her ‘Wumpini - Nakpayili’ group have asked for a loan of GHS 6000. Azara’s share of the loan is GHS 600 which would be used to buy paddy rice from rice farmers for processing. She aspires to produce in large quantities in future and earn more income as well as repay this loan, support her family with foodstuffs, and pay her children's educational expenses.

Azara thanks Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: To buy paddy rice from rice farmers for processing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bread in bulk.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio de 57 años de edad, es un campesino trabajador dedicado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos que ya son independientes.

Rogelio es agricultor y en sus días libres trabaja como jornal para personas particulares y así genera ingresos para su familia y cubrir gastos del hogar.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra. 

Él sueña con ver su parcela con una producción excelente que le ayude a sustento de su familia y para vender maíz a otras personas que lo necesiten.
texts.en:
Rogelio, 57 years old, is a dedicated rural worker. He is married and his wife takes care of the domestic tasks. He has two children who are now independent.

Rogelio is a farmer and on his free days, he works as a day laborer for specific people and in this way gets income for his family to cover the household costs.

He needs the loan to purchase fertilizer and to pay labor costs.

He dreams of seeing his plot of land with an excellent production which helps him support his family and to sell corn to other people who need it.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Santos Mercedes

texts.es:
Santos de 35 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora de oficios domésticos con un nivel académico de segundo grado de educación básica, está soltera y vive con sus 3 hijos de los cuales 2 están en la escuela y el mayor de ellos se dedica al trabajo de jornalero. 

Santos se dedica a la elaboración de petates desde hace 20 años, labor que aprendió por cultura de sus padres y así genera un ingreso económico para el sustento de ella y su familia, además se dedica a trabajos agrícolas y su hijo mayor es quien se involucra.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para realizar el trabajo.   


Su sueño más grande es sacar adelante a sus hijos, darles el sustento diario y lograr formarlos como profesionales.
texts.en:
Santos is 35 years old. She is a working woman who does domestic work and she has two years of basic education. She is single and lives with her 3 children. Two of them are in school and the oldest works as day labor.

Santos has worked making petates (mats woven from palm fibers) for 20 years, work that she learned from her parent's culture. From it she generates an economic income to support herself and her family. She also works in agriculture and her oldest son helps with this.

She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer and pay for labor to perform the work.

Her biggest dream is to get ahead with her children, provide them with their daily needs and see them become professionals.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer and pay for labor to perform the work.

loans.name: Ana Mirna

texts.es:
Mirna, estudio hasta segundo grado, ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos y tenia que ayudarles con los oficios domésticos, ahora está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor y jornalero, juntos tienen tres hijos de los cuales dos le ayudan con los trabajos agrícolas y el otro hijo aún continua estudiando noveno grado. 

Mirna, se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 15 años de edad, ya que sus padres le enseñaron a cultivar, ella hace esta actividad junto con su pareja e hijos, el lugar donde ella siembra se encuentra a un kilómetro de su casa y tiene que desplazar a pie para ir a ver su trabajo y regularmente las actividades las realizan por la mañana.  

Mirna, necesita el crédito para comprar abono y herbicidas para su cultivo de maíz, con el financiamiento espera dar un mejor manejo a su cultivo y obtener mejores ganancias al momento de la venta de su cosecha.  

Mirna, sueña con ampliar su casa ya que donde viven es bastante pequeño, también quiere dejar a su hijos un buen legado cuando ella ya no se encuentre.
texts.en:
Mirna went to school up to the second grade, since her parents had limited resources and she had to help them with the household chores. She is now partnered, and her partner is a farmer and day laborer. They have three children together, of whom two help her with the farm work and the other is still a student, in ninth grade. 

Mirna has worked in agriculture since she was 15 years old, since her parents taught her how to grow crops. She does this work with her partner and children. The place where she plants is a kilometer from her house and she has to go by foot to see to her work and they usually do the work in the morning.

Mirna needs the loan to purchase manure and herbicides for her corn crop. With the loan, she hopes to give her crops better care and get better earnings when she sells her harvest. 

Mirna dreams of expanding her house since where they live is rather small. She also wants to leave her children a good legacy when she is no longer around.

loans.use: to purchase manure and herbicides for her corn crops.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a married woman with two kids, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Flora operates a grocery stall selling vegetables; she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With the KES 10,000, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Kpangmanga - Zoggu Group

texts.en:
Abibata is a 45-year-old mother of nine children living in Zoggu, a community in the Northern region of Ghana. Four of Abibata’s children are exclusively dependent on her. 

Abibata leads a 34-member shea butter processing group called "Kpangmanga - Zoggu." She is the person seated fourth in front from the right with the hand raised in the group photo. 

Abibata and her group have been in shea butter processing business for more than a decade now. They all have been trained to be able to process premium quality shea nuts and butter by Grameen Ghana. They have requested a loan amount of GHS 13,200, which they will use to buy a larger volume of shea nuts for processing to meet an order by a local marketer. Abibata’s share of the loan is GHS 400.

Abibata and her group consider meeting the order as a great opportunity to earn more income to repay this loan and support their business and families. Abibata and her group, "Kpangmanga - Zoggu" are hopeful of Kiva lenders’ support.

loans.use: to buy a larger volume of shea nuts for processing to meet an order by a local marketer.

loans.name: Maria Lucia

texts.es:
María es pate de una familia muy unida, vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos de 15 y 8 años de edad, para ir mejorando el estilo de vida de su familia ella inicio a  vender ropa y lociones por medio de revistas hace tres años, trabaja de ocho de la mañana a dos y media de la tarde, el oficio lo aprendió a desarrollar con ayuda de su familia, por el momento no representa dificultades.
Con el propósito de mejorar las ventas y atraer nuevos clientes, ha decidido solicitar un crédito para comprar faldas, pantalones, camisas, trajes para niños/as, etc., para presentar un nuevo inventario en su negocio, espera tener un resultado positivo con la inversión.
Los sueños de María son tener una situación financiera más estable, cancelar la deuda y que su familia tenga mejor alimentación, educación y vestuario.
texts.en:
María is part of a very close-knit family. She lives with her life partner and two children, ages 15 and 8. To improve her family's lifestyle, she began to sell clothing and lotions through catalogs three years ago. She works from eight in the morning until two thirty in the afternoon. She learned how to do the work with the help of her family, and at this time there are no difficulties. 

With the goal of improving sales and attracting new customers, she has decided to ask for a loan to purchase skirts, pants, shirts, children's outfits, etc., to have a new inventory in her business. She hopes to have a positive result with the investment.

María's dreams are to have a more stable financial situation, pay off the debt, and that her family has better food, education and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase skirts, pants, shirts, children's outfits, etc. to have a new inventory in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, crackers, soft drinks and other household staples.

loans.name: Yesenia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Yesenia, utiliza los créditos para mantener con actividad la venta de tortillas, cosméticos y ha mejorado mucho el servicio del molino nixtamal, con las ganancias ha establecido una tienda de productos de la canasta básica, su familia se mantiene con el mismo núcleo y los ingresos han mejorado un poco, en este tiempo han presentado problemas de salud familiar pero ya sean superado.
Solicita un crédito que en esta ocasión utilizara para comprar aceite, pan, detergente, granos básicos, golosinas, etc., incluirá nuevos productos en el inventario de la tienda para disminuir las necesidades de sus clientes y continuar teniendo su fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Yesenia uses the loans to keep up her work selling tortillas and cosmetics and and improved her corn mill service. With the earnings, she has established a store with basic products. Her family is still the same group and her income has improved a bit. Recently, some family health problems have arisen, but they have been able to overcome them.  

She asks for a loan this time that she will use to purchase oil, bread, detergent, basic grains, candies, etc. She will include new products in her store's inventory to reduce her customer's needs and to continue having her source of income.

loans.use: to purchase oil, bread, detergent, basic grains, candies, etc.; she will include new products in her store's inventory to reduce her customer's needs.

loans.name: María Luciana

texts.es:
María de 54 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora con un nivel académico de cuarto grado, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura y jornal, tiene tres hijos, dos de ellos estudian y el mayor pudo sacar el bachillerato.

María se dedica a la venta de antojitos pupusas, pasteles de carne, yuca frita, etc. se ha dedicado a esta labor por más de 7 años, además trabaja con su esposo cultivando una parcela de verduras.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar insecticidas, foliar, fertilizantes y otros productos que se utilizan en esta práctica agropecuaria. 

Ella sueña con tener su plantación bien nutrida para sacar buenos ingresos y cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
María, 54 years old, is a hard-working person with a fourth grade level of schooling. She is partnered and her partner works in agriculture and as a day laborer. She has three children, two of them are students and the oldest was able to finish secondary school.  

María works selling snacks of pupusas, meat pies, fried yucca, etc. She has done this work for more than 7 years. In addition, she works with her partner with their vegetable crops. 

She asks for this loan to purchase insecticides, liquid fertilizer for the leaves, fertilizer, and other products that are used in agriculture. 

She dreams of having a well-nourished farm to get good income and cover the family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, liquid fertilizer for the leaves, fertilizer, and other products that are used in agriculture.

loans.name: Eliseo

texts.es:
Eliseo de 42 años de edad, es un campesino trabajador y humilde muy dedicado a su labor, por motivos de recursos económicos no pudo asistir a muchos grados académicos, solo hasta segundo grado, está soltero y solo vive con su madre la cual depende de él. 


Eliseo es agricultor, sus ingresos son únicamente de esta labor, la cual realiza desde que estaba en su adolescencia ya que su padre lo indujo a dicha práctica. 

Él necesita el financiamiento para comprar insumos para el cultivo del maíz y pagar mano de obra.

Él solo desea que sus cosechas sean productivas y le generen ganancias.
texts.en:
Eliseo is 42 years old. He is a hard-working and humble farmer who is very dedicated to his work. For economic reasons he could not go very far in school, he only studied up to Grade 2. He is single and lives alone with his mother who is dependent on him.

Eliseo is a farmer and his income comes completely from this work. He has done this work since he was an adolescent as his father introduced him to the trade. He needs the loan to buy inputs for his corn crops and pay for labor. He only wishes for his crops to be productive to generate income for him.

loans.use: to buy inputs for his corn crops and pay for labor.

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Mariée, Ama  est une femme de 38 ans qui vit à Bè avec ses enfants. Pour vivre et venir en aide aux besoins de la famille, Ama vend des  bananes plantains  dans son quartier. Ama s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et les revend dans son quartier en réalisant un bon bénéfice grâce à son activité génératrice de revenu. Ama désire ce microcrédit pour acheter des tas de bananes plantains afin de favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants et  générer assez de revenus.
texts.en:
Ama  is a married woman of 38 who lives at Bè with her children. In order to make a living and support her family, Ama sells plantains in her neighborhood. She stocks up twice a month at the market and resells the plantains in her area, making a good income thanks to her money-earning activity. 

Ama wants to have this small loan to buy some plies of plantains for support the education of her children and so as to generate enough income.

loans.use: to buy three piles of plantains for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to improve his farming activity through use of farmyard manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sugar, chicken, wine and beer for re-selling in her grocery store.

loans.name: Jeannette Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jeannette es una señora que tiene desde hace aproximadamente ocho años una venta de frutas y verduras, ya es reconocida en su comunidad por dicha actividad económica, lo que le da una ventaja para comercializar fácilmente sus productos, vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ambos luchan para sacar a su familia adelante y no cuentan con ayuda económica del extranjero.
Como una manera de mantener la fidelidad de sus clientes, requiere de un crédito para comprar zanahorias, tomates, piñas, remolachas, naranjas, etc., con lo que ofrecerá a sus clientes mercadería fresca y a precios razonables, será de mucho beneficio para atender mejor a sus clientes e incrementar sus ventas y tener nuevos ingresos.
Las aspiraciones que tiene Jeannette son mantener la responsabilidad que la caracteriza para cancelar su deuda y ser una guía para que sus hijos sean personas de bien en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Jeannette is a woman who, for approximately eight years, has sold fruits and vegetables. She is now known in her community for this work, which gives her an advantage to sell her products easily. She lives with her life partner and their children. They both struggle to get their family ahead and don't have any financial support from abroad.

As a way to keep her customers' loyalty, she needs a loan to purchase carrots, tomatoes, pineapples, beets, oranges, etc., with which she will offer her customers fresh merchandise at reasonable prices. It will be a big benefit to serve her customers better and to increase her sales and have new income.

Jeannette's aspirations are to maintain the responsibility that characterizes her by paying off her debt and to be a guide so that her children are good people in the society.

loans.use: to purchase carrots, tomatoes, pineapple, beets, oranges, etc. to offer her customers fresh merchandise at reasonable prices.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel de 50 años de edad, está casado y su esposa se dedica a vender en un chalet, tiene 4 hijos pero solo 3 viven con él.

Miguel se ha dedicado a trabajar como jornal desde hace más de 20 años, además presta servicios de transporte con una lancha,  fue la necesidad la que lo llevó a dedicarse a esto y le sirve para el sustento diario de él y su familia. 

Él solicita este crédito para comprar un motor para reparar una lancha que mantiene desocupada, el planea repararla para dar más servicios y cubrir la demanda de clientes. 

Su mayor sueño es aumentar sus ingresos y cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia pues todos trabajan en equipo.
texts.en:
Miguel, 50 years old, is married and his wife works selling from a kiosk. He has 4 children, but only 3 live with him.

Miguel has worked as a day laborer for over 20 years. In addition, he offers transportation services in a boat. Necessity brought him to this work and it serves to provide daily sustenance for him and his family. 

He asks for this loan to purchase a motor to repair a boat that he has out of use. He plans to repair it to provide more services and to meet his customers' demand. 

His greatest dream is to increase his income and cover his family's basic needs since they all work as a team.

loans.use: to purchase a motor to repair a boat that he has out of use.

loans.name: Mevi

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 27 ans, Mevi est une femme qui vit à Bè avec ses deux enfants. Au marché et dans son quartier, Mevi vend des couches bébés, des habits pour bébé et des pommades de beauté  à ses clients et trouve son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Mevi s’approvisionne une fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Mevi demande ce crédit pour commander des couches et des habits pour bébé et réaliser encore plus de revenus pour aider son mari à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Married and aged 27, Mevi is a woman who lives in Bè with her two children. At the market and in her neighborhood, Mevi sells diapers, clothing for babies, and beauty cremes to her clients and makes her living in this fashion. To keep up efficiently with her clientele's needs, Mevi stocks up once a month from her suppliers. She is requesting this loan to order some diapers and clothing for babies so as to make still more income to help her husband with the daily expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of baby diapers and three dozen outfits for babies

loans.name: Gleds

texts.pt:
Senhora Gleds tem 29 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 1 filho frequentando o ensino primário, é docente, vive em casa própria com os irmãos.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, areia, chapas, portas, janelas para anexar um quarto de banho na sua casa.
Nos próximos tempos pretende construir mercearia e iniciar um negócio como forma de aumentar a renda familiar porque o salário não é suficiente para sustentar as despesas da casa, pretende casar oficialmente, e comprar carro para o transporte pessoal.
O seu desafio é de fazer poupanças no banco para o futuro do filho terminar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora.
texts.en:
Gleds is 29 years old and single. She has a son who's in primary school. She's a teacher and lives with her siblings in a house that she owns.
The amount of the loan will be used to purchase cement, sand, metal plates, doors and windows in order to add a bathroom to her house.
In the near future she intends to build a grocery store and start a business as a way of improving her family's income, since her salary isn't enough to afford her household expenses. She also intends to get officially married and buy a car for personal transportation.
Her challenge is saving money in the bank for the sake of her son's future. Another challenge is repaying the loan without delinquency.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, metal plates, doors and windows in order to add a bathroom to her house.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, vive junto a su esposa y su hijo de 16 años de edad, su negocio es brindar el servicio transporte en su vehículo y administrar una venta de tamales de elotes, el negocio lo fundo hace 10 años y para desarrollarlo le colabora la familia.
Él solicita un préstamo para pagar el mantenimiento del vehículo también comprara elotes para elaborar la venta de tamales, fortalecerá  el negocio y tendrá en óptimas condiciones su vehículo para realizar viajes.
Sus proyectos son tener un negocio competitivo en la zona y generar recursos económicos para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and 16-year-old child. His business is offering transportation services in his vehicle and running a business selling corn tamales. He founded this business 10 years ago and, to develop it, he works with his family.  

He asks for a loan to pay for maintenance on his vehicle and also to purchase corn to make and sell tamales. He will strengthen the business and have his vehicle in prime condition to make trips.

His projects are to have a competitive business in the zone and to generate economic resources to meet his obligations.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his vehicle and also to purchase corn to make and sell tamales.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a 51-year-old sari-sari store owner from the town of Dumanjug, Cebu. She is married and has been engaged in selling snacks and operating a sari-sari store for 12 years now. From this venture, Judith earned PHP 5,000 per month.

Judith decided to improve her store but she has limited funds. She is asking for a loan of PHP 18,000 to buy more biscuits, canned goods, cooking oil, and sugar  for her sari-sari store inventory and to buy food for family consumption.

Judith plans to explore other business opportunities in the future to make her livelihood more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, canned goods, cooking oil, and sugar for her sari-sari store inventory and to buy food for family consumption

loans.name: Marleny Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marleny tiene 26 años de edad, su grado académico fue hasta cuarto grado, actualmente está casada y su compañero de vida es un albañil, tiene un hijo que apenas es un bebé. Marleny trabajaba dando servicio en un molino, pero ahora se dedica más que todo a los oficios domésticos.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar un molino propio y brindar servicios a los habitantes de su comunidad, ya que cuenta con la experiencia que adquirió hace años.

Su mayor sueño es que su hijo sea alguien de bien y ponga en práctica los buenos valores.
texts.en:
Marleny is 26 years old, completed the fourth grade, and is married. Her life partner is a construction worker and she has one child who is still a baby. Marleny worked providing milling services, but now she works above all in the domestic tasks. 

She asks for this loan to purchase her own mill and offer services to the people of her community, since she has the experience that she got years ago. 

Her greatest dream is that her child becomes a good person and puts into practice good values.

loans.use: to purchase her own mill and offer services to the people of her community.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es: ZENAIDA: Es una mujer luchadora y cordial, pertenece a la etnia miskita, originaria de la Ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Tiene 46 años de edad, madre soltera de 2: El mayor de de 20 años estudia su carrera universitaria y el menor de 17 años cursa su 5to año de secundaria. Cuenta con una experiencia de más de dos décadas de ser docente de educación primaria y secundaria. Desde  hace 12 años habitan en una casa construida de madera y de tambo, que actualmente necesita reparación.  Es por eso que solicitan un préstamo para cambiar madera rústica, madera cepillada, postes de madera, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es establecer una pulpería o una tienda de ropa y calzado.
texts.en: Zenaida is a determined and friendly woman. She is of the Miskita ethnicity, from the city of Bilwi, Puerto Cabezas municipality. She is 46 years old, the single mother of 2 children. The older one is 20  and is a university student and the younger one is 17 and is in his 5th year of secondary school. She has more than two decades of experience as a teacher in primary and secondary education. For the past 12 years, they have lived in a wooden stilt house, which currently needs repairs. For this, she asks for a loan to replace raw wood, planed wood, wooden posts, nails and to pay labor costs. Her dream is to establish a general store or a clothing and shoe store.

loans.use: to replace raw wood, planed wood, wooden posts, nails and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, de 68 años de edad, es ama de casa, es viuda, tiene 4 hijos, no tiene ningún grado académico y vive junto a sus 4 hijos.

María, se dedica a la agricultura y junto a su hijo mayor trabajan preparando la tierra hasta obtener la cosecha.

María, solicita el crédito para comprar abono, pesticidas y comprar una bomba rociadora para los cultivos, con esto pretende asegurar una buena cosecha.

El sueño de María, es darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y que ellos se conviertan en profesionales.
texts.en:
María, 68 years old, is a housewife, a widow, has 4 children, doesn't have any schooling, and lives with her 4 children.

María works in agriculture and, with her oldest child, they work preparing the land until they get a harvest.

María asks for the loan to purchase manure and pesticides, and to purchase a spray pump for the crops. With this, she plans to assure a good harvest.

María's dream is to give her children a better quality of life and that they become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase manure, pesticides and to purchase a spray pump for the crops.

loans.name: María Reina

texts.es:
María de 28 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta quinto grado, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor, solo han procreado un hijo que apenas tiene 1 año de edad.

María se dedica a los oficios domésticos, ella presta servicios de lavandería a personas particulares, este trabajo lo realiza todos los días por la necesidad de salir adelante, además le ayuda a su esposo con los trabajos agrícolas.

Ella necesita el financiamiento para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar mano de obra para realizar la siembra de granos básicos.

Su sueño es ver crecer a su hijo, que nunca le falte nada y siempre tener un trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Maria is 28 years old and has a 5th grade education. She is married and her partner is a farmer. Together they have only one child who is barely 1 year old.

Maria makes a living doing domestic work. She provides personal laundry services to people, and she works every day in order to forge ahead. She also helps her husband with the agricultural work.

She needs this loan to buy farm supplies and to pay laborers to sow basic grains. He dream is to see her child grow up without lacking anything, and to always have decent work.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and to pay laborers to sow basic grains.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
MARIAM  est  une  commerçante  âgée   de  42 ans  mariée,  mère de  7 enfants,  qui sont  Agés  de  2 à 21 ans   dont  4 son  scolarises   , C’ est une  cliente  très  courageuse  dans  son  activité  commerciale de riz et de condiment.  elle  est  gentil  dans son  travail  sur  la  photo  c’est  elle  qui  est  accroupié  devant  , son  mari  est un  cultivateur . La cliente  a  un  niveaux  d’ instruction  à  l’ école  coranique.     
Son  lieu  d’ approvisionnement   est  BAMAKO et KATI  ,  et  les  vend  dans  les  marchés  de  sa  localité ,  elle  peut  avoir  une    bénéfice  de  15 000 FCFA  par  mois.   Elle a fait  recourt  au prêt  RMCR  qui l’aide dans son activité. Elle est  très  contente,  son rêve est   de construire un  magasin  de stockage pour ces marchandises.    

.
texts.en:
Mariam  is a small-scale merchant aged 42, married and the mother of seven children, who are between 2 and 21 years of age. Four of them are attending school. She works very hard at her business, selling rice and condiments. She is pleasant with her clients. She is the one who is stooping in front in the photo. Her husband is a farmer.

Mariam has a Koranic school education. She buys her supplies in Bamako and Kati, and resells her goods in the markets in her area. She can attain a profit of 15,000 F CFA per month.

Mariam came to RMCR to request a loan to help her in her business. She is very happy, and her dream is to build a room where she can warehouse her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy rice and condiments

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic to make and sell sheeting during the rainy season.

loans.name: Gerson

texts.pt:
Senhor Gerson tem 30 anos de idade, vive maritalmente com a sua esposa, é pai de um filho sem idade escolar, é docente e estudante universitário, vive em casa dos pais, sustenta sua enteada e duas sobrinhas.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de blocos, cimento, areia, para dar a continuidade a construção da sua casa.
No futuro pretende fazer um negócio como forma de aumentar a renda familiar visto que o salário não é suficiente para suportar todas as despesas.
O seu maior desafio é de terminar a licenciatura e mudar de carreira, e consequentemente melhorar a condição salarial e dai poderá diminuir as dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
Gerson is 30 years old. He's in a common law marriage with his wife and has a son who's below school age. He's a teacher and a college student. He lives with his parents and supports his stepdaughter and two nieces.
The amount of the loan will be used to purchase bricks, cement and sand so he can continue building his house.
In the future he intends to start a business as a way of improving his family's income. His salary isn't enough to afford all the expenses.
His biggest challenge is finishing college and changing careers. Therefore he'll improve his wages and that way he'll be able to ease his financial struggles.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement and sand so he can continue building his house.

loans.name: Geraldo

texts.pt:
Senhor Geraldo tem 56 anos de idade, casado, pai de 4 filhos que frequentam  os ensinos primário e superior, é pensionista militar, vive em casa própria com a sua família a qual sustenta.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, areia, blocos, varões para a reabilitação da sua casa de modo a dar um lar confortável a sua família.
No futuro pretende terminar a construção da sua casa e comprar uma camioneta para o transporte de mercadorias.
O seu maior desafio é de liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora de modo a garantir futuros financiamentos na Hluvuku Adsema.
texts.en:
Geraldo is 56 years old and married. He has four children who are in primary school and college. He's a military pensioner. He lives with his family in a house that he owns, and he's the breadwinner.
